description: The 13th head of the Keikain family, he fought alongside Nurarihyon to seal the Hagoromo-Gitsune using the shikigami, "Hagun", which summons the spirits of all the previous heads of the Keikain family. He lends the spirit blade, Nenekirimaru, to Nurarihyon during the battle, and later after he dies he becomes part of "Hagun".
name: Keikain Hidemoto
